1.Name: Six-Star Flight
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
When the skill activates, if there's no Sword on the field, Sprout summons six flying swords to attack the target, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and accumulating <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup</color>.
If a Sword is already on the field, Sprout steps onto it and charges up, unleashing a stronger flurry of slashes that deals massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and accumulates <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup</color>.

1.Name: Heartbound Bond
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When <color=#FFFFFF>Ye Shunguang</color> is in the squad: Sprout's DMG increases by 30%. When using its Active Skill while in Ether Veil: Verdict, 1 Sword is summoned to the field.

2.Desc:

1.Name: Sword of Unification
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>
Summons a massive Sword of Unification that stabs enemies, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and accumulating <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup</color>.
